mapper.select: WITH recursive rounds(round) as ( VALUES(${round}) UNION SELECT round -1 FROM rounds WHERE round > #{round} - #{limit} + 1 ) SELECT A.round - B.round AS diff , count(*) as cnt FROM rounds A LEFT JOIN LottoHistory B ON A.round > B.round AND B.${column} NOT IN ( UNNEST( ( SELECT nums FROM LottoHistory WHERE round = A.round ) ) ) GROUP BY A.round - B.round ORDER BY cnt DESC , diff ASC
WITH RECURSIVE t(n) AS ( VALUES (1) UNION SELECT n+1 FROM t WHERE n < 100 ) SELECT sum(n) FROM t
SELECT round , num1_ord , num2_ord , num3_ord , num4_ord , num5_ord , num6_ord FROM LottoHistory WHERE round = #{round}
